title: Relentless (1U194)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Search. Response: If a stealth event is played, spot 3 [Moria] minions to cancel that event.
Lore:	”'Then dig a hole in the ground,' said Legolas, 'if that is more after the fashion of your kind. But you must dig swift and deep, if you wish to hide from Orcs.'”
Rarity:	U
